::Annihilator/Killer/Zeus::

Annihilator and Zeus stay behind in the newcomers base, in case of another 
attack on them. Zeus was repaired from his previous encounter with his 
brother, but was raging, eager for revenge. The two relax in command chairs, 
waiting for something to happen.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Killer arrives at the Ark, instantly opening fire.
